entries.title: User Personas — content updates from stakeholder feedback

changes.text: Parent Outcomes: Reframed 'Context > constant monitoring' to 'Know what's happening & what to do next' (de-emphasize camera/why since cam isn't in v1); reframed 'Alerts, not streams' to emphasize background trust
Parent Outcomes: Added 'Vehicle peace of mind' outcome — head off costly maintenance, reduce stress of trusting teens with car upkeep
Parent Visibility: Added trip-in-progress nuance — show real-time confirmation trip is 'good' when parent opens app mid-trip, but powerful summaries become the natural primary touchpoint
Parent Success: Added maintenance metric and proxy metrics (app-open frequency within 15 min of trip start; teen weekly score screen opens and milestone shares)
Trust & Fairness (both personas): Added non-judgmental framing rule and data privacy assurance (won't be used against them, sold, or shared)
Teen Triggers: Added check-engine-light empowerment and 'demystify car ownership' trigger moments
Teen Outcomes: Moved 'Proof of innocence' (video) to bottom of list with future-phase note; promoted and strengthened 'Progress path' with confidence and anxiety reduction
Teen Trust: Added parent-access phase ramp-down rule (parent sees more early, access decreases as trust is earned)

entries.title: First Trip Journey — content updates from stakeholder feedback

changes.text: Setup: Reordered user actions (unbox first, then download app); added billing/payment collection, primary driver association, and optional secondary driver invites
Setup: Miles now pulls vehicle data from OBD-II (VIN, make/model, status, diagnostics) as instant feedback during setup
Trigger: Added OBD-II diagnostics to Miles Actions; updated opportunity to emphasize real-time accuracy as the key first-drive trust moment
Interpretation: Updated user goal to focus on confidence in accuracy — "Understand how Miles works. Get confidence that Miles is accurate and working quietly in the background"
Action: Added first-trip push notification and alert customization prompt; shifted emotion to curious/interested; sharpened pain point around trip summary accuracy as the trust-buster
Resolution: Added option to reassign a trip to a different driver
Follow Up: Added setup completion prompts and dashboard status; added future consideration callout for parental access ramp-down phases (0–3)
Updated the secondary (sand) color ramp values in tokens.
Refined style tiles layout with full-bleed backgrounds and theme-specific overrides for hero, blog, and signup tiles.
Adjusted primary/tertiary button colors and hover states for better consistency across themes.
Simplified the color palette page by removing UI states and recommended color pairing sections.
Updated green logo assets (badge, icon, wordmark) in the styleguide.
Change Log
Brand color palette with primary, secondary, and neutral colors
Typography scale with Inter and Acme Gothic fonts
Logo variants (badge, wordmark, icon) in multiple colors
Image style guidelines with scene examples
Style tiles showing brand elements in context
Changelog page for tracking styleguide updates
